Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 154th overall pick, by New York (N) in 2010...
Injured on 7/26/2010 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Injured on 8/28/2014 with a Bruised Ulna, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by New York (N) on 2/12/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 3/1/2016 to a minor league contract.
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Chicago (A) on 5/8/2018 (Going to LAA: RF M. Skole. Going to CHA: P T. Donlon, 3B B. Ritchey, RF M. Shaw, C L. Powell)...
Had first career hit on 9/25/2018, off Brian Wilson (TB)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/30/2018, off Clayton Richard (TOR)...
Injured on 8/18/2020 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Released by Chicago (A) on 7/3/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 7/3/2022 to a minor league deal...
